{"id":1367423033,"question_id":3556,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"3 months, 1 week","timestamp":1724558114,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/1367423033/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Final Array State After K Multiplication Operations II","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    long long binpow(long long a, long long b, long long m) {\n        a %= m;\n        long long res = 1;\n        while (b > 0) {\n            if (b & 1)\n                res = res * a % m;\n            a = a * a % m;\n            b >>= 1;\n        }\n        return res;\n    }\n\n    vector<int> getFinalState(vector<int>& nums, int k, int multiplier) {\n        const long long MOD = 1e9+7;\n\n        priority_queue<pair<long long, int>, vector<pair<long long, int>>, greater<pair<long long, int>>> pq;\n        long long N = (int)nums.size();\n        long long MX = 0;\n        for (int i=0; i<N; i++) {\n            pq.push({nums[i], i});\n            MX = max(MX, 1LL*nums[i]);\n        }\n\n        long long val = 0;\n        for (int i=0; i<k; i++) {\n            if (pq.top().first * 1LL * multiplier >= MX && !val) {\n                val = k / N;\n                k = k % N;\n            }\n            if (i >= k)\n                break;\n            pair<long long, int> x = pq.top();\n            pq.pop();\n            pq.push({(x.first * 1LL * multiplier) % MOD, x.second});\n            MX = max(MX, (x.first * 1LL * multiplier) % MOD);\n        } \n\n        while (!pq.empty()) {\n            pair<long long, int> x = pq.top();\n            nums[x.second] = ((((x.first*1LL)%MOD)*binpow(multiplier, val, MOD))%MOD);\n            pq.pop();\n        }\n        return nums;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"final-array-state-after-k-multiplication-operations-ii","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
